acme.util.count

Class AbstractCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • acme.util.count.AbstractCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<AbstractCounter>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Counter, HighWaterMark, Timer

    public abstract class AbstractCounter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<AbstractCounter>
    A general class to "count things." Subclasses can do lots of different types of counting, but all counters will log themselves in the XML generated by a run.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The group to which the counter belongs
